title: Ice Dreams Part 3
description: When Madison’s heart got broken, she didn’t believe that anything or anyone would ever be able fix it. She was completely devastated when Hunter left her in pieces because he couldn’t handle his emotions. When she turned to her next door neighbor Mike for comfort, he opened his arms and his heart to her. In his arms, she found peace and her smile again. But when tragedy suddenly hit her family, she had no choice but to deal with her feelings towards Hunter. She had to decide if she would allow him back into her heart or move on for good…. Ice Dreams Part 3 is the conclusion to Hunter and Madison’s story…Don’t miss out! **Book contains Adult Language**
author: Melissa Johns
